caption.title: Multiple sequence alignment of basic and hinge regions of StbZIPs.
caption.p: The StbZIP proteins were classified into 11 categories (A-I, S, and U). Each groupâ€™s representative bZIP was taken as reference from Arabidopsis, rice, maize, and barley and is shown in the red box. An asterisk marks conserved amino acid residues.
